entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then rain. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
